Simultaneous- Default setting for standard simultaneous turns.[n] [n]
Hybrid- Simultaneous at peace, sequential at war.[n] [n]
Turbo Dynamic Timer- Players take turns simultaneously with a very fast dynamic timer (45s base + 5s per city + 0.5s per unit).[n] [n]
Fast Dynamic Timer- Players take turns simultaneously with a fast dynamic timer (60s base + 5s per city + 1s per unit).[n] [n]
Normal Dynamic Timer- Players take turns simultaneously with a standard dynamic timer (30s base + 5s per city + 3s per unit).[n] [n]
Casual Dynamic Timer- Players take turns simultaneously with a relaxed dynamic timer (45s base + 5s per city + 3s per unit).[n] [n]
